pricing_page.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing_page.description: Choose the right plan for your business needs with our transparent pricing options.
pricing_page.faq1_question: Do you offer custom pricing for specific projects?
pricing_page.faq1_answer: Yes, we offer custom quotes for projects with specific requirements. Contact us to discuss your unique needs and get a personalized quote.
pricing_page.faq2_question: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing_page.faq2_answer: We accept major credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal. For larger projects, we can also arrange payment plans to fit your budget.
pricing_page.faq3_question: Is there a contract or minimum commitment?
pricing_page.faq3_answer: Our standard projects include a simple contract outlining deliverables and timelines. We don't impose long-term commitments unless specifically requested.
pricing_page.faq4_question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits or startups?
pricing_page.faq4_answer: Yes, we offer special rates for registered non-profit organizations and early-stage startups. Contact us for more information.

pricing.plan1_description: Essential digital services for small businesses
pricing.plan3_description: Complete digital transformation for established businesses
pricing.custom_solution_description: We offer tailored packages designed to meet your specific business requirements and goals.

about_page.title: About MBM Digital
about_page.description_1: We provide innovative digital solutions that help businesses grow
about_page.description_2: A team of experts specialized in digital transformation
about_page.mission_description: Our mission is to empower businesses to succeed in the digital age
about_page.subtitle: A team of digital experts passionate about helping businesses succeed online.

our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.paragraph1: MBM Digital was founded in 2018 with a simple mission: to provide businesses with the digital tools and strategies they need to thrive in today's online landscape.
our_story.paragraph2: What started as a small team of three passionate digital marketers has grown into a full-service digital agency with experts in web design, content creation, SEO, social media, and video production.
our_story.paragraph3: Today, we've helped over 200 businesses across various industries establish and grow their digital presence, always staying at the forefront of digital trends and technologies.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses of all sizes with innovative digital solutions that drive real results and sustainable growth in an ever-evolving digital landscape.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the most trusted digital partner for businesses seeking to transform their online presence and achieve exceptional growth through digital excellence.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Our diverse team of digital experts brings together skills from across the digital spectrum to deliver exceptional results for our clients.

member1.name: Michael Brown
member1.bio: With over 15 years in digital marketing, Michael founded MBM Digital to help businesses navigate the digital landscape effectively.

member2.name: Sarah Chen
member2.bio: Sarah leads our creative team with her exceptional eye for design and passion for creating engaging visual experiences.

member3.name: David Rodriguez
member3.bio: David combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving to build websites that are both beautiful and functional.

member4.name: Aisha Patel
member4.bio: Aisha's strategic approach to digital marketing helps our clients achieve measurable results across all digital channels.
